sentences.en: A liter of gas have less mass than a liter of water.
sentences.cn: 一公升汽油的质量比一公升水的质量小.

sentences.en: a liter of water
sentences.cn: 一升水

sentences.en: According to technological requirement, 20 Cubic liter mixer machine has designed.
sentences.cn: 按照工艺技术要求设计20立升高速混合机.

sentences.en: Add 20 mg. of diatomaceous earth filter aid per liter of solution.
sentences.cn: 对每升溶液加入20毫克硅藻土助滤剂.

sentences.en: Add nine - and - one - half milliliters of salt to each liter of boiled water.
sentences.cn: 每公升沸水加入 9.15 毫升的盐.

sentences.en: Bee Yong Joon consumed 7 liter of water per one day.
sentences.cn: 裴勇俊以此每天饮7公升水.

sentences.en: Containers must be placed and well-sealed in one transparent plastic bag with a press-seal, of a maximum capacity of one liter (quart).
sentences.cn: 这些东西必须被密封放置在一个有冲压密封圈的，最大容量为一公升（一夸脱）的透明塑料袋中。

sentences.en: Craig: Sounds interesting . Do you have anything in a twenty - liter capacity?
sentences.cn: 克雷格: 听起来不错. 你们有容积廿公升的机种 吗 ?

sentences.en: Give me a big bag and a two-liter of diet Sprite.
sentences.cn: 给我一包大包的和一瓶两公升的低糖“雪碧”汽水。

sentences.en: He still drank 1 liter of liquor every morning.
sentences.cn: 他仍然每天早上喝一升酒.

sentences.en: I was so thirsty that I drank a liter of iced tea.
sentences.cn: 我太渴了,竟然喝了一公升的冰茶.

sentences.en: Inhabitants there sip large quantities of hot black tea - typically drinking more than a liter (1.8 pints) per day per person - but also have a low incidence of tobacco and alcohol use.
sentences.cn: 在那里的居民饮用大量的热的黑茶，通常可以每个人每天喝超过一升（1.8品脱）的量，同时他们也会偶尔使用烟草和酒精。

sentences.en: It takes over three times as much energy to produce a liter of non-organic milk than a liter of organic milk.
sentences.cn: 生产一公升的非有机牛奶所需能源，比生产一公升的有机牛奶还要多出三倍以上。

sentences.en: Joe: Well, on a long run around 25 kilometers per liter at 110 kph.
sentences.cn: 乔伊: 嗯, 以跑长途来说,在时速一百一十公里下,每公升汽油可以跑25公里左右.

sentences.en: Replace engines oil filter on 0 liter and 4 liter engines.
sentences.cn: 更换在0公升和4公升引擎上的引擎机油滤清器.

sentences.en: So this is moles per liter per second, right? It's disappearance of some concentration for time.
sentences.cn: 所以这里的单位是摩尔每升每秒，对吗？这代表浓度随着时间的减少。

sentences.en: The average fuel consumption for this car is 10 kilometers per liter.
sentences.cn: 这部车的平均燃油消耗量为每公升可跑10公里.

sentences.en: The average traffic fuel ( gasoline ) consumption of this lorry is 0.3 liter per kilometer ( l / km ).
sentences.cn: 这台货车的平均行车柴油 ( 汽油 ) 耗量为每公里 0.3 公升.

sentences.en: The bottle holds a liter of beer.
sentences.cn: 这个瓶子装一升啤酒.

sentences.en: This bottle holds one liter.
sentences.cn: 这个瓶子装一升.

sentences.en: You will need 30 bottles for a standard 23 liter recipe.
sentences.cn: 您需要30个瓶子来装一份23公升标准的配方.

trans.tran_en: (<英>litre)the basic unit for measuring liquid in the metric system
